diqvaspari# prathaqmaM ja#j~jE aqgniraqsmad dviqtIyaqM pari# jAqtavE#dAH | 
tRuqtIya#maqPsu nRuqmaNAq aja#sraqmindhA#na EnaM jaratE svAqdhIH || 
viqdmA tE# agnE trEqdhA traqyANi# viqdmA tEq sadmaq viBRu#taM puruqtrA | 
viqdmA tEq nAma# paraqmaM guhAq yadviqdmA tamuthsaqM ~Myata# Ajaqgantha# || 
saqmuqdrE tvA# nRuqmaNA# aqPsva#ntarnRuqcakShA# IdhE diqvO a#gnaq Udhann# |
